content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Mister Schmidt. His full name is Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg. It was an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 750 Euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator
